org.grouplens.lenskit.data.source

Class AbstractDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.source.AbstractDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSource, Specifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericDataSource, TextDataSource

    public abstract class AbstractDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSource
    Base class to help implement data sources. This class automatically wraps the event DAO in a prefetching DAO to produce the specialized DAO classes, if it does not already implement those classes. It also produces a LensKit configuration with the appropriate bindings for the configured data source.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Detail

      • getUserEventDAO

        public UserEventDAO getUserEventDAO()
        Default user-event DAO implementation. If the event DAO implements UserEventDAO, it is returned directly; otherwise, a new PrefetchingUserEventDAO is created.
        Specified by:
        getUserEventDAO in interface DataSource
        Returns:
        The user-event DAO.

      • getItemEventDAO

        public ItemEventDAO getItemEventDAO()
        Default item-event DAO implementation. If the event DAO implements ItemEventDAO, it is returned directly; otherwise, a new PrefetchingItemEventDAO is created.
        Specified by:
        getItemEventDAO in interface DataSource
        Returns:
        The item-event DAO.

      • getItemDAO

        public ItemDAO getItemDAO()
        Default item DAO implementation. If the event DAO implements ItemDAO, it is returned directly; otherwise, a new PrefetchingItemDAO is created.
        Specified by:
        getItemDAO in interface DataSource
        Returns:

        public UserDAO getUserDAO()

      • getItemNameDAO

        public ItemNameDAO getItemNameDAO()
        Get the item name DAO. The default implementation first checks if the event DAO implements this interface, then the item DAO.
        Specified by:
        getItemNameDAO in interface DataSource
        Returns:
        The item name DAO, or null if none is defined.

        Configure LensKit to use this data set.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
